column2: Summon a large burst of wind from your Grimoire, dealing [1], clearing non-cursed surfaces, and pushing enemies back [2]m.

Propel yourself to a target location.
Translocation Magic
If the Translocation Grimoire is active, enemies you pass by receive Translocation Damage and are knocked down (resisted by Magic Armor). Allies passed receive Translocation Surge. Additionally, you also receive Translocation Surge.

Activate the Mimicry Magic within your Grimoire.
Every 3 turns, the grimoire will copy the first non-source skill you cast.

Activate the Translocation Magic within your Grimoire.
Upon teleporting an enemy, apply Translocation Damage, dealing [1].
When teleporting an ally or yourself, apply Translocation Surge, granting +[2]% Movement Speed, +[3]% Damage, +[4]% Critical Chance, and healing [5].

Activate the Wind Magic within your Grimoire.
Upon casting an Air skill on an enemy or position, the Grimoire shoots Wind Magic at the target for [1].

Gain a one-time use copy of the last skill a target used.
If the skill is already known, no copy is granted.

Randomly swap the positions of objects caught within [1].
Translocation Magic
If the Translocation Grimoire is active, apply Translocation Damage to enemies, and Translocation Surge to allies.

Activate the Death Magic within your Grimoire.
Necromancy-based skills have a chance to inflict a random status ailment on enemies.
Gain the Torment Soul skill.

Exude an aura of death for 4 turns. When an enemy dies, their soul erupts for [1] and sets a stack of Soul Burn on surrounding enemies within [2] range.
Allies (and you) create a Tormented Ghost upon death, haunting the battlefield for 3 turns.
If the Tormented Ghost slays an enemy, their body is resurrected.

Torment the soul of a character or corpse.
If the target is dead, create a Ghost that haunts the battlefield for 2 turns.
If the target is alive, apply Tormented for 2 turns, dealing [1] within a [2] radius when they die, and creating a Ghost.
If you die within 2 turns after casting this skill, haunt the battlefield as a Ghost.
Party members who slay an enemy while in Ghost Form will be resurrected.

Activate the Fire Magic within your Grimoire.
When casting a fire-type target, projectile, or projectile strike spell on an enemy or position, a Fire Cloud is created at that location.
When Burning is applied to you, gain a 2% stacking damage bonus (max 5 stacks).
If Necrofire is applied to you, 10% Vitality/Armour/Magic Armour is restored.

Gain the Eternal Spark in your main hand, granting the ability to throw fire for [1] (Scales with Intelligence).
Attacking a Burning target with the Eternal Spark cleanses Burning and deals [2] in a [3] radius, while additionally granting a 2% stacking damage bonus (max 5 stacks).
